subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Steve McNair announced his retirement Thursday, ending a 13-year career in which he was selected the co-most valuable player, led the Tennessee Titans to the Super Bowl and orchestrated the most successful regular season in the Baltimore Ravens’ history.
